document.full_text: a prominent organization of the fiscally conservative tea party on wednesday made its first endorsement in the 2012 campaign, backing nebraska republican attorney general jon bruning for senate.
document.title: tea party group makes first 2012 endorsement
lines_and_colors: a prominent organization of the fiscally conservative tea party on wednesday made its first endorsement in the 2012 campaign, backing nebraska republican attorney general jon bruning for senate.
